name: UnsubscribeTeamNotifications
description:
Unsubscribe a team from specific notification subscriptions.

Use this tool to unsubscribe a specific team from receiving notifications on specified entities. This is helpful when you need to manage or reduce notification overload for teams.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The ID of the resource to unsubscribe from notifications. This should be a string value representing the unique identifier for the specific resource.

parameters.name: accept_header_versioning
parameters.description: String specifying the API version through the 'Accept' header for versioning purposes.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: unsubscribe_entities
parameters.description: A JSON object detailing the entities to unsubscribe from. Include 'subscribable_id' and 'subscribable_type' for each entity.

subscribable_id.description: The ID of the entity to subscribe to

subscribable_type.description: The type of the entity being subscribed to

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Pagerduty API.

parameters.name: Accept
parameters.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

subscribable_id.description: The ID of the entity to subscribe to

subscribable_type.description: The type of the entity being subscribed to

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
